sentences.en: a widely used method
sentences.cn: 广泛使用的方法

sentences.en: an author who had travelled widely in East Asia
sentences.cn: 曾游历东亚各地的一位作家

sentences.en: He is widely regarded as Hungary's most skilful politician.
sentences.cn: 他是公认的匈牙利最有手腕的政治家。

sentences.en: He published widely in scientific journals.
sentences.cn: 他在科学期刊上广泛发表文章。

sentences.en: He was grinning widely, waving to her as he ran.
sentences.cn: 他咧嘴大笑着，一边跑一边向她挥手。

sentences.en: He was widely respected as a wise and statesmanlike governor.
sentences.cn: 他作为一位睿智、具备政治家才干的州长而广受尊崇。

sentences.en: He was widely travelled.
sentences.cn: 他去过很多地方。

sentences.en: His achievements, though hardly exciting, were widely admired.
sentences.cn: 尽管他的成就不怎么激动人心，可依然备受赞赏。

sentences.en: Organic food is now widely available.
sentences.cn: 现在有机食品很多地方都可买到。

sentences.en: Parental attitudes vary widely.
sentences.cn: 家长态度千差万别。

sentences.en: Rural communities are widely separated and often small.
sentences.cn: 乡村村落彼此离得很远，而且通常规模很小。

sentences.en: The alfalfa plant is widely used as animal fodder.
sentences.cn: 苜蓿科植物广泛用作动物饲料。

sentences.en: The availability of nursery school places varies widely across London.
sentences.cn: 伦敦幼儿园的分布非常不均衡。

sentences.en: The contract for this will no doubt be widely advertised.
sentences.cn: 关于这个的合约无疑会受到广泛宣传。

sentences.en: The play is being widely read as an allegory of imperialist conquest.
sentences.cn: 这部剧被广泛解读为对帝国主义征服的讽喻。

sentences.en: The poll was widely discredited after allegations of ballot rigging.
sentences.cn: 选举舞弊的指控出现后，这次投票测验受到了广泛质疑。

sentences.en: The price of a cut and blow-dry varies widely.
sentences.cn: 剪发并吹干的价格高低不等。

sentences.en: The quality of the applicants varies widely.
sentences.cn: 申请人的素质差异很大。

sentences.en: The treatment regime may vary widely depending on the type of injury.
sentences.cn: 因受伤类型不同治疗方法可能有很大的区别。

sentences.en: These laws were widely regarded as too strict.
sentences.cn: 人们普遍认为这些法令太苛刻。

sentences.en: This view was not widely held.
sentences.cn: 这种观点并不普遍。
